note.p: Death: Abbaye St-Victor, Paris, France (25 November 1694)
Career: Travelled in Italy, Germany, Poland and to the Levant, as ambassador of King Casimir; having been raised as a Protestant, he became a Roman Catholic
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB; Biographie Universelle; Hunter
References: E N da C Andrade, 'The Birth and Early Days of the Philosophical Transactions' in NR 1965 vol 20 pp 9-27
